00055 class homography : public CvMat
00056 {
00057 public:
00058   homography();
00059

00061              float u2, float v2, float up2, float vp2,
00062              float u3, float v3, float up3, float vp3,
00063              float u4, float v4, float up4, float vp4);
00064

00069                 float u2, float v2, float up2, float vp2,
00070                 float u3, float v3, float up3, float vp3,
00071                 float u4, float v4, float up4, float vp4);
00072

00075   void add_match(float u, float v, float up, float vp);
00076   void release_matches(void);

00108 inline float homography::cvmGet(const int i, const int j)
00109 {
00110   return data.fl[3 * i + j];
00111 }
00112 
00113 inline void  homography::cvmSet(const int i, const int j, const float val)
00114 {
00115   data.fl[3 * i + j] = val;
00116 }
00117 
00118 inline void  homography::cvmSet(const int i, const int j, const double val)
00119 {
00120   data.fl[3 * i + j] = (float)val;
00121 }
00122 
00123 inline float cvmGet(const homography * H, const int i, const int j)
00124 {
00125   assert (H->rows == 3 && H->cols == 3);
00126 
00127   return H->data.fl[3 * i + j];
00128 }
00129 
00130 inline void cvmSet(const homography * H, const int i, const int j, const float val)
00131 {
00132   assert (H->rows == 3 && H->cols == 3);
00133 
00134   H->data.fl[3 * i + j] = val;
00135 }
00136 
00137 inline void cvmSet(const homography * H, const int i, const int j, const double val)
00138 {
00139   assert (H->rows == 3 && H->cols == 3);
